In this presentation on the [Research Synthesis & Big Data Conference](https://conference-service.com/ressyn-bigdata/xpage.html?xpage=231&lang=en) I introduced [_preregRS_](https://github.com/j-5chneider/preregRS): An R Markdown template to preregister research syntheses. The template is available in RStudio after installing the R package [_preregRS_](https://github.com/j-5chneider/preregRS). It is intended to guide the preregistration process and enable compatibility (e.g. to include analysis code, results, embed PDFs, plots).
